attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It looks like the goverment of the United Kingdom has circumed to the european Nations in the expense of it's historicals, giving a roaming to a wider white counterpart, than "the common wealth" brotherhood!  BLACKS are being left destitute through various Governmet legislations, to force "(smoke)" them out of the United Kingdom!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
